thread.title: Kim Stoker
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Kim Stoker

author: Kim Stoker
title: Kim Stoker
text: I have bought many books for my son and myself on Thriftbooks for years. I would recommend them to anyone who needs a book, but doesn't want to pay the full price for a brand new one. When I ordered 2 Study guides that had been written in and were unusable for me, they were quick to offer me credit. Great company, great service!
